title: "NIST Proposal Aims to Reduce Bias in Artificial Intelligence"
excerpt: "The National Institute of Standards and Technology recently released a proposal regarding the risk of bias in the use of artificial intelligence to help reduce it. The agency is seeking comments from the tech community."
